job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtAt Apple great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what we could accomplishltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtApple Cloud Machine Learning team is looking for hardworking and strong Software and ML platform engineers at all levels of seniority to help us build the next generation Anomaly detection platform and other ML platforms Our team is solving key challenges in detecting outliers in big data using Machine Learning model delivery and serving with driven focus on data security and preserving user privacy ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYoull work in a small and dynamic team building new functionalities for Anomaly detection and ML platforms and collaborating across groups Youll also participate in crafting systems algorithm and optimization efforts to ship product with impactltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThis position requires a broad set of software engineering skills focusing on developing ML platform pieces You should have experience with shipping production systems that scale to millions of usersltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtYouve earned a a PhD in Computer Science with experience building production systems or b MS in CS with 4 years of experience in working with large data projects with at least 1 year running experiments or building experimentation platform or c BS in CS with 6 years of experience in the industry with at least 2 year running experiments or building experimentation platformltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtProven track record of delivering production softwareltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExperience building large scale applicationsservices with Java Scala or PythonltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExperience with SQLNoSQL databases Spark Hadoop or other distributed frameworksltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExperience with machine learning solution on timeseries is a plusltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtStrong datadriven thinkingltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtProven mathematical knowledgeltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtIn this role youll ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Build platforms and features which will help data driven decisionmaking and improve Apples user experience ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Build anomaly detection platform and work closely with partner teams to help integration and analysisltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Build distributed backend systems for training and serving ML models at Apple scaleltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Build backend for data visualization tools to facilitate analysis ampamp synthesis of complex datasets ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Provide technical leadership ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Influence datadriven optimization effortsltbrgtltbrgt
